name: Human
description: Humans are the original biological beings, often characterized by their emotional depth and complex moral dilemmas. They navigate a world filled with technological advancements, grappling with issues of identity, survival, and the consequences of their creations.

name: Replicant
description: Replicants are bioengineered beings desigend to resemble humans closely, created for labor and entertainment in off-world colonies. They possess advanced physical abilities and emotions, but their limited lifespan and societal oppression raise questions about their humanity, autonomy, and rights.
